item.title: Vote for cash PI, everything works but mysql (xampp)
item.dc:creator: @Taharahora Taharahora
item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

I am using this tut: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,476829.0.html

I created a database, and the went to SQL to add my own in on the database ( I am using Xampp)
When I add this into it:

[code]define(“MYSQL_HOST”, “localhost”);
/**

  • mysql username to connect to the database server
    /
    define(“MYSQL_USERNAME”, “databaseusername_here”);
    /    *
  • mysql password the password to connect to the database server
    /
    define(“MYSQL_PASSWORD”, “mypasswordhere”);
    /    *
  • mysql database the database name in which you have your vote table setup
    */
    define(“MYSQL_DATABASE”, “yourdatabase_here”);[/code]

It all comes up as an error. I got highscores working and I got the web page for vote for cash working and server sided working only need now is mysql working

EDIT: yes i changed the stuff to my username and password

Read full topic
item.source: Vote for cash PI, everything works but mysql (xampp)
